data.name: ASCIIWarning
data.value: Email address contains non-Latin letters.

data.value: Change ESS status

data.name: PersonalPhoneNotUniq
data.value: The mobile phone number must be unique for the person.

data.name: PersonalPhoneNumbersCountError
data.value: Invalid format of the phone number. The number must consist of 11 digits.

data.name: PersonalPhoneRequired
PersonalPhoneNotUniqInESS
data.value: Personal phone number must be unique within the Employee Self Service database. Contact your system administrator.

data.name: BusinessUnitOfEmployeeIsNotUseEssError
data.value: You can send invitations only to employees of an active business unit connected to Employee Self Service.

data.name: SaveBeforeCreateESSUser
data.value: Save the employee card before you send the invitation.

data.name: SaveBeforeDeleteESSUser
data.value: Save the employee card before you disconnect him or her from Employee Self Service.

data.name: EmptyPersonalEMailError
data.value: Specify the employee's personal email in the "Employee Self Service" group.

data.name: IsNeedUpdateEmployees
data.value: IsNeedUpdateEmployees:{0}

data.name: EmployeeWithMainPlaceEmploymentTypeDouble
data.value: In the "Employee" databook, the record with the primary employment type has already been created for this person. Fill in the "Employment type" field with the "Internal secondary employment" or "External secondary employment".

data.name: PropertyChanged
data.value: Field "{0}" will be changed for all employee cards with specified person {1}.

data.name: PersonHasSeveralActiveEmployees
data.value: All employees, in whose card person {0} is specified, will be disconnected from the ESS.

data.name: LockedByAsync
data.value: Employee data is being updated, and values in some fields cannot be changed. Try again later.

data.name: DeleteEssUserDialogHeader
data.value: Select Disconnection Option

data.name: BeforeCertificateIssueTaskError
data.value: An error occurred when sending a request to issue an electronic signature certificate: {0}

data.name: DeleteEssUserDialogString
data.value: Suspend or delete employee's account in the ESS? A deleted account cannot be restored. To provide the employee with access to the ESS, create a new account.

data.name: DeleteEssUserDialogButton
data.value: Delete Account

data.name: TemporaryDisconnectEssUserDialogButton
data.value: Suspend Account

data.name: IssueCertificateTaskSent
data.value: Issue of the electronic signature certificate has been initiated.

data.name: EmptyEmail
data.value: Specify the employee's email in group "Delivery Methods" or "Contact Information". If the employee does not have an email, then in the ESS connection settings, specify a company's email to receive the certificate.

data.name: CertificateIssueTaskAlreadyExist
data.value: A task to issue an electronic signature certificate for this employee already exists. Send another task?

data.name: ESSUserActivated
data.value: Employee is connected

data.name: RevokeCertificateDialogTitle
data.value: Select Certificate to Revoke

data.name: Certificate
data.value: Certificate

data.name: RevocationReason
data.value: Reason

data.name: RevocationDone
data.value: The certificate has been successfully revoked.

data.name: CertificateRevocationError
data.value: An error occurred when revoking the certificate. Contact your system administrator.

data.name: CloudCertificateAlreadyExist
data.value: The employee has an active certificate. Do you want to issue a new certificate?

data.name: EssUserDisconnectNotify
data.value: The account has been deleted from the Employee Self Service.

data.name: EssUserTemporaryDisconnectNotify
data.value: The account has been temporarily disconnected from the Employee Self Service.

data.name: EmptyEMailError
data.value: Specify the employee's email in the "Contact Information" group.

data.name: EmptyPersonalEMailOrWorkEmailError
data.value: Specify the email in the "Contact Information" group or the personal email in the "Employee Self Service" group.

data.name: EmptySMSError
data.value: To notify the employee of their assignments via SMS or Viber, connect the employee to the Employee Self Service.

data.name: NeedReissueCertificateAfterChange
data.value: Contact information for receiving confirmation codes has changed. Issue a new electronic signature certificate.

data.name: ChangingConfirmationTypeWhenSigning
data.value: Configure Confirmation for Document Signing

data.name: EmptyPersonalEMailOrWorkEmailPartTimeWorkerError
data.value: In the cards of employees working on multiple job positions, specify email in the "Contact Information" group or personal email in the "Employee Self Service" group.

data.name: EmptyEmailPartTimeWorkerError
data.value: In the cards of employees working on multiple job positions, specify email in the "Contact Information" group.

data.name: PropertyChangedInBusinessUnit
data.value: Value of field "{0}" will change for all employees of this business unit that are related to person {1}.

data.name: ErrorChangeStatusWhenEmployeeCardLock
data.value: Status of connection to ESS will change after the employee card is closed. Change of the status will take some time.

data.name: ErrorChangeStatusWhenPartTimeEmployeeCardLock
data.value: Status of connection to ESS will change after this card and cards of employee's other job positions are closed. Change of the status will take some time.

data.name: OnlyPrimaryEmploymentTypeCanHaveLogin
data.value: Cannot assign an account to the employee with the internal secondary employment type. Change the employment type or assign the account to the employee with the primary employment type.

data.name: InheritFormEmptyBusinessUnitError
data.value: On the "HR Pro" tab, clear checkbox "Use notification settings of business unit". Change the settings if required.
